nodes.text: The Tuff1 Combat Jumpsuit was a light protective suit of armor that was designed to be worn under loose clothing. It was made with padded sections in the knees, elbows and chest. Manufactured from a lightweight material that dried quickly, it was comfortable for use in long periods. The suit also had various straps and rings for attaching equipment. It was mostly for backup protection, and was often worn under other forms of armor.
Luke Skywalker and Jacen Solo wore these suits on Belkadan while trying to discover what the Yuuzhan Vong had done to the planet.
